PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: J-V curves of polymer solar cells fabricated with different weight ratio of PSFDTBT : PC71BM in TCB solutions are shown in Figure 3b.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| J-V curves |
| PSFDTBT |
| PC71BM |
| TCB solutions |

Note:

* J-V curves refer to the current-voltage characteristics of a device, which is a plot of the current density versus the voltage.
* PSFDTBT and PC71BM are both materials used in the fabrication of polymer solar cells.
* TCB solutions refer to solutions of tetrachlorobenzene (TCB) used as a solvent in the fabrication process.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| J-V curves |
| PSFDTBT |
| PC71BM |

Note:

* J-V curves refer to the current-voltage characteristics of a device, which is a plot of the current density versus the voltage.
* PSFDTBT and PC71BM are both materials used in the fabrication of polymer solar cells.

The following entities do not clearly refer to material properties and were removed:

* TCB solutions (refer to a solvent used in the fabrication process, not a material property)
